name: WMImplant Hack Tool
false_positives: Administrative scripts that use the same keywords.
query: powershell.file.script_block_text:(/.*[Ww][Mm][Ii][Mm][Pp][Ll][Aa][Nn][Tt].*/ OR /.*\ [Cc][Hh][Aa][Nn][Gg][Ee]_[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Gg][Ee][Nn]_[Cc][Ll][Ii]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Aa][Nn][Dd]_[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee]_[Ww][Dd][Ii][Gg][Ee][Ss][Tt]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee]_[Ww][Ii][Nn][Rr][Mm]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee]_[Ww][Dd][Ii][Gg][Ee][Ss][Tt]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee]_[Ww][Ii][Nn][Rr][Mm]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Rr][Ee][Gg][Ii][Ss][Tt][Rr][Yy]_[Mm][Oo][Dd]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Rr][Ee][Mm][Oo][Tt][Ee]_[Pp][Oo][Ss][Hh]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Ss][Cc][Hh][Ee][Dd]_[Jj][Oo][Bb]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]_[Mm][Oo][Dd]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Pp][Rr][Oo][Cc][Ee][Ss][Ss]_[Kk][Ii][Ll][Ll]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Aa][Cc][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ee]_[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Bb][Aa][Ss][Ii][Cc]_[Ii][Nn][Ff][Oo]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr]_[Oo][Ff][Ff]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Vv][Aa][Cc][Aa][Nn][Tt]_[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\ .*/ OR /.*\ [Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Nn]_[Ee][Vv][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss]\ .*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`powershell.file.script_block_text:(*WMImplant* OR *\ change_user\ * OR *\ gen_cli\ * OR *\ command_exec\ * OR *\ disable_wdigest\ * OR *\ disable_winrm\ * OR *\ enable_wdigest\ * OR *\ enable_winrm\ * OR *\ registry_mod\ * OR *\ remote_posh\ * OR *\ sched_job\ * OR *\ service_mod\ * OR *\ process_kill\ * OR *\ active_users\ * OR *\ basic_info\ * OR *\ power_off\ * OR *\ vacant_system\ * OR *\ logon_events\ *)`
